<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[House Cleaner - Part Time and Full Time]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Hiring Immediately!  
  

  
 Day shift only, no nights! 
  

  
 360 Precision Cleaning is looking to add YOU to our team- $15/hr + TIPS!! 
  

  
 Sites are located in Phoenix, Tempe, Scottsdale, North Scottsdale, Paradise Valley - you must have your own transportation 
  

  
  Spanish speaking/bilingual preferred   
  

  
 
  

  
 About the Position 
  

  

  
+  Professionally clean and maintain properties using cleaning procedures and products in conformance with prescribed company standards 
  

  
+  Sweeping, vacuuming, mopping, dusting, and washing all surfaces  
  

  
+  Move all reasonably portable furniture to clean under and behind 
  

  
+  Assist with laundry as needed 
  

  
+  Create a welcoming environment for our guests and owners by ensuring homes 
  

  
+  are clean and cared for 
  

  
+  Collect and remove trash and debris  
  

  
+  Replenish consumable items such as soaps and paper products 
  

  
+  Other responsibilities as assigned - every job is different 
  

  

  
 Compensation 
  

  

  
+  Starts at $15/hr with potential to grow based on previous experience, on the job performance and quality and speed of work. 
  

  
+  Health (medical, dental, and vision) benefits available to all qualifying employees, we pay a portion of monthly benefits costs. 
  

  
+  Sales contests, referral bonuses, and ongoing monthly bonus opportunities available throughout the year to boost your take-home pay! 
  

  
+  Paid holidays and time-off earned throughout the year after your first 90 days for qualifying employees. 
  

  
+  Keep 100% of customer tips. 
  

  

  
 
  

  
 About Us 
  

  
 360 Precision Cleaning is a veteran-owned and family-operated cleaning business serving the Greater Phoenix Metro area. Join our team and work directly with the owners to help us grow, perfect our services and build long lasting relationships. 
  

  
 We take pride in our work, knowing our tireless efforts provide peace of mind. We’re the vacation heroes—giving guests and homeowners a spotless first impression and setting the tone for an unforgettable experience.  
  

  
 We’re searching for a reliable, hard-working individual who is ready to exceed clients expectations while providing their homes with supreme cleanliness. Your hardwork and dedication will never go unnoticed, come work for a company who appreciates you as an individual not just an employee! 
  

  
 Requirements 
  

  

  
+  Must be authorized to work in the United States 
  

  
+  Must have a valid driver's license and reliable transportation to drive to job sites 
  

  
+  Own a smartphone that allows you access to our cleaning services app 
  

  
+  Attention to detail 
  

  
+  Minimum 1 year of cleaning experience preferred, but not required 
  

  
+  Positive attitude, team player, motivated, hard working individual 
  

  
+  Must be in overall good health, and able to keep up with the demands of a physical job such as house cleaning.  This includes, but is not limited to: 
  

  
+  Lifting at least 25 pounds on a regular and daily basis 
  

  
+  Performing repetitive cleaning tasks everyday 
  

  

  

  
+  On-time, organized, and able to be punctual or early to all scheduled work shifts 
  

  
+  Attend all mandatory individual and team meetings 
  

  
+  Be able to pass a background check, and drug screening  
  

  
+  Must be available to work within the hours of 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM on weekdays and weekends
